attributes.action: Lower housing prices to reasonable and affordable prices
attributes.additional_details: its 2021 and many many people in my age group and above stuggle to find affordable, non shared ownership or proper housing to buy. this should not be an issue and all should be able to buy their own house or flat especially with many many buildings these days simply being turned into housing or flats (thats another issue) i wish for the government or parliament to change this and to make it easier for housing to be bought at far more reasonable prices without attachments or paying for life.
attributes.background: Simply put... as a man in his mid to late 20s it is not easy at all to buy your own house or flat. I wish for that to be changed/made easier and for the ludicrous housing prices to be lowered to reasonable levels so that all may be able to live or be safe. Housing should not be a luxury!.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about house prices in the UK, however it is not clear which specific actions you would like the Government to take to reduce these.

If there are specific actions you'd like the Government to take to reduce the cost of buying a house in the UK, or to support first-time buyers in particular, you could start a petition about that.

In the meantime you may like to sign the following petitions which call for related actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550943
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569700
